featured.text: Kevin had been standing on a ladder trying to reach for a book on the top shelf when he lost his and fell to the ground.
Upon the super typhoon warning, Nancy rushed to the supermarket—only to find the shelves almost ______ and the stock nearly gone.
Moisture and oxygen promote oxidation and therefore limit its shelf life.
Bacteria can multiply if the water is kept on the shelves for too long or if it is exposed to heat or direct sunlight.

definition.zh_def: 架子，通常用來放置物品的平面結構。
definition.en_def: A flat, horizontal surface used for storing or displaying items.
definition.example: She placed the books on the shelf.
